```{r}
library(vistime)

dat <- data.frame(Position=c(rep("President", 3), rep("Vice", 3)),
              Name = c("Washington", "Adams", "Jefferson", "Adams", "Jefferson", "Burr"),
              start = rep(c("1789-03-29", "1797-02-03", "1801-02-03"), 2),
              end = rep(c("1797-02-03", "1801-02-03", "1809-02-03"), 2),
              color = c('#cbb69d', '#603913', '#c69c6e'),
              fontcolor = rep("white", 3))
dat
vistime(dat, events="Position", groups="Name", title="Presidents of the USA")


gantt <- data.frame(Position = c("Submit Scientific Reports", "GlobeImmune", "Esx5", "Analyze sequencing", "Outline", "Cyto-feature chapter RD", "Lit Review", "Website"),
           Task = c("Cyto-feature Manuscript", "Aim 1 Analysis", "Aim 1 Analysis", "Skill Acquisition", "Dissertation", "Dissertation", "Dissertation", "Skill Acquisition"),
           Start = c("2019-11-18", "2019-11-18", "2019-12-2", "2020-1-15", "2019-12-2", "2020-1-15", "2020-1-30", "2019-12-8"),
           Finish = c("2019-11-23", "2019-11-23", "2019-12-7", "2020-1-22", "2019-12-7", "2020-1-30", "2020-2-14", "2019-12-15"),
           color = c("pink", "blue", "green", "lightblue", "lightgreen", "purple", "pink", "lightpurple"))

vistime(gantt, events = "Position", groups = "Task", start = "Start", end = "Finish", title = "PhD Completion")
```
